ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Some more questions for you. 1. Is this card new and did this start happening once he card was installed? 2. Did you install the software from the CD that came
ygData.messageBody:
Some more questions for you.

1. Is this card new and did this start happening once
he card was installed?

2. Did you install the software from the CD that came
with it, or have you downloaded the LATEST driver for
the card?

3. Not so much a question but I searched my machine
for that file and it is in Windows\System which means
it is an Operating System file.

Search the web for this file and see what you get. I
will myself and get back to you.

Good luck

--- Justin <pavisoj@...> wrote:
> Does anyone know how to fix the following
> problem? I can log onto the sever screen and chose
> my server but when I click play everquest i get a
> eggame caused an error in DINPUT8.DLL I have tryed
> to fix it by restarting the system like they day to
> but get no results. I have a GeForce3 TI 200 video
> card. I was wondering if anyone else has had this
> problem.
>
